overview: Tulsyan Security Services Pvt. Ltd. is a trusted provider of comprehensive outsourcing solutions, specializing in Security Services, Housekeeping, Solid Waste Management, Payroll Management, Electricity Meter Reading and Bill Distribution, and complete Facility Management. With over a decade of consistent growth, TSSPL has expanded its expertise into emerging sectors such as Smart City projects, Renewable Energy, and Civil Service Work. The company is guided by a strong commitment to excellence, reliability, and long-term client partnerships.
mission_statement: Provide high-quality, affordable contract outsourcing solutions.
Create and cultivate long-term relationships with clients.
Respond immediately to the changing needs of clients.
why_us: At Tulsyan Group, excellence is an ongoing journey. The company focuses on sustained quality improvement, long-term relationships, and continuous client satisfaction. A team of experienced professionals ensures seamless, round-the-clock support, allowing clients to focus on their core operations with confidence.
competitive_advantages: Zero investment required on machines or equipment.
Comprehensive security and facility management under one roof.
Reduced administrative burden for manpower control.
No downtime stress for machine breakdowns or consumable inventory management.

security_services.overview: Security Services is the core business of TSSPL. The company employs well-trained security guards equipped with modern security systems, supervised by ex-Army personnel to ensure discipline and operational excellence.
deployment_process: Recruitment and deployment of trained guards.
Medical fitness and background verification checks.
Regular firefighting and emergency response training.
Monthly review meetings with clients for feedback and improvement.
Strict record maintenance (visitor logs, registers, asset and inventory records).

recruitment_policy.objective: To ensure operational excellence through a rigorous and transparent hiring process.
steps: Service history check for the past five years.
Evaluation of grooming and hygiene standards.
Assessment of personal and professional integrity.

electricity_meter_reading_and_billing: Route planning and meter access management.
housekeeping: Facade cleaning and janitorial supply management.
Health, safety, and green cleaning initiatives.
payroll_management_and_consultancy: Reporting, analytics, and bank payment processing.
